title: Request of new feature
author: aaljaseem
body_snippet:
Hello everyone,

I am a Mobaxterm user. But that is a payed tool where i cat save more than limited number of sessions.
Now i am trying out ,mRemoteNG but the pain point that mRemoteNG has is a ftp side bar. This feature is very handy with linux machines where you can drag and drop files from and to the remote machine.

Also there is a monitoring bar down of the screen. It would be really handy also to have it.
![mobaxterm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20978632/90394650-5343fb...

iterations.description: Requesting an integrated SFTP file browser sidebar (MobaXterm-style) — a major new feature requiring a full file manager UI component and SSH.NET integration, far outside the scope of a remote connections manager and with no active development in 5+ years.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Requesting an integrated SFTP file browser sidebar (MobaXterm-style) — a major new feature requiring a full file manager UI component and SSH.NET integration, far outside the scope of a remote connections manager and with no active development in 5+ years.
Approach: Close as out-of-scope; mRemoteNG is a connection manager, not a full SSH client with file browser. Users can use standalone SFTP clients (WinSCP, FileZilla) alongside mRemoteNG.
